languages.text: {n}Идира почти хрюкает от восторга:{/n} "Слышали бы тебя святоши экклезеархии, братец! Приравнивать наши "грязные силы" к благословению Бога-Императора... Это вы, ребята, здорово придумали!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира почти хрюкает от восторга:{/n} "Слышали бы тебя святоши экклезеархии, братец! Приравнивать наши "грязные силы" к благословению Бога-Императора... Это вы, ребята, здорово придумали!"

languages.text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира почти хрюкает от восторга:{/n} "Слышали бы тебя святоши экклезеархии, братец! Приравнивать наши "грязные силы" к благословению Бога-Императора... Это вы, ребята, здорово придумали!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with laughter:{/n} "If only the Ecclesiarchy holy folks could hear, brother! Equating our 'dirty powers' to the God-Emperor's blessing... That's rich, you guys!"
{n}Idira almost snorts with laughter:{/n} "If only the Ecclesiarchy holy folks could hear, brother! Equating our 'dirty powers' to the God-Emperor's blessing... That's rich, you guys!"
{n}Idira almost snorts with laughter:{/n} "If only the Ecclesiarchy holy folks could hear it! Equating our 'dirty powers' to the God-Emperor's blessing... That's rich, you guys!"
{n}Idira almost snorts with laughter:{/n} "If only the Ecclesiarchy holy folks could hear it! Equating our 'dirty powers' to the God-Emperor's blessing... That's rich, you guys!"

{n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

{n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

languages.text: {n}Idira casi resopla de diversión.{/n} «¡Ay, si los santurrones de la Eclesiarquía oyesen esto! Equiparar nuestros "poderes impuros" a la bendición del Dios Emperador... ¡Brillante, es brillante!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira resopla, conteniendo a duras penas una carcajada:{/n} «¡Ay, si esos santurrones de la Eclesiarquía oyesen esto! Equiparar nuestros "sucios poderes" a la bendición del Dios Emperador... ¡me parto de la risa!».

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声，几乎要笑了起来。{/n}“要是国教那些道貌岸然的家伙能听到这些话就好了！把我们的‘邪恶力量’说成是神皇的祝福……这可太扯了！真的，太扯了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声，几乎要笑了起来。{/n}“要是国教那些道貌岸然的家伙能听到这些话就好了！把我们的‘邪恶力量’说成是神皇的祝福……这可太离谱了，伙计！”

languages.text: {n}Idira manque de s'étrangler de rire.{/n} « Je donnerais cher pour voir la réaction des culs bénis de l'Ecclésiarchie s'ils entendaient ça ! Assimiler nos "pouvoirs impies" à la bénédiction de l'Empereur-Dieu... Impayable ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira manque de s'étrangler de rire.{/n} « Je donnerais cher pour voir la réaction des culs bénis de l'Ecclésiarchie s'ils entendaient ça ! Assimiler nos "pouvoirs maudits" à la bénédiction de l'Empereur-Dieu... Impayable ! »

languages.text: {n}イディラは、喜びのあまり鼻で笑いそうになる。{/n}「帝国聖教会の聖職者たちに聞かせてやりたいものね！私たちの『穢れた力』を、神帝陛下の祝福と同列に扱うなんて…面白いわね！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは、喜びのあまり鼻で笑いそうになる。{/n}「帝国聖教会の聖職者たちに聞かせてやりたいものね！私たちの『穢れた力』を、神帝陛下の祝福と同列に扱うなんて…面白いわね！」

languages.text: {n}Idira prustet vor Entzücken fast los.{/n} "Wenn das mal die heiligen Leute der Ekklesiarchie hören könnten! Unsere 'unreinen Kräfte' mit dem Segen des Gottimperators gleichzusetzen ... Herrlich, einfach herrlich!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira prustet vor Lachen fast los:{/n} "Wenn das mal die heiligen Leute der Ekklesiarchie hören könnten! Unsere 'dreckigen Kräfte' mit dem Segen des Gottimperators gleichzusetzen ... Das ist wirklich mal was, Leute!"

languages.text: {n}İdira, keyif içinde neredeyse kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Keşke kutsal Ekleşiarşi camiası, şu sözleri bir duyabilseydi! 'Kirli güçlerimizi' Tanrı İmparator'un lütfuyla kıyaslamak... Harika bir şey bu, gerçekten harika!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira almost snorts with delight.{/n} "If only the holy folk of the Ecclesiarchy could hear that! Equating our 'unclean powers' with the God-Emperor's blessing... That's brilliant, just brilliant!"
